title: Hell Bound (restored, with intro and outro) (1957, film noir, imdb score: 6.3)

sources.title: Hell Bound (restored, with intro and outro) (1957, film noir, imdb score: 6.3)
sources.description: Hell Bound is a 1957 American crime film directed by William J. Hole Jr. and written by Richard H. Landau. The film stars John Russell , June Blair , Stuart Whitman , Margo Woode and George E. Mather. The film was released in October 1957, by United Artists .
